role_dependencies: Installs Java on nearly any OS
Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that installs GIMP on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: This repository contains an Ansible role that installs GIMP on nearly any platform. GIMP is a free and open-source raster graphics editor used for image manipulation and image editing, free-form drawing, transcoding between different image file formats, and more specialized tasks. GIMP is released under GPLv3+ license and is available for Linux, macOS, and Microsoft Windows.
